segments.text: I'm looking for some lipsticks . Do you still have some in peach rose ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . That is a beautiful color . It has been a very popular lipstick this season . I have just two left .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you heard about our special promotion this month ? If you purchase at least 200 yuan in any loreal products , you will receive this black hand bag with a sample of blusher , mascara and two shades of eye shadow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow . That sounds like a bargain . I'm running low on facial moisturizer and powder . Could you ring those up for me along with the lipstick ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd be glad to . Do you need anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2
